Package ecom.Cart

Class Cart

java.lang.Object
ecom.Cart.ShoppingCart
public class Cart extends Object
Class represents an ecommerce cart. Includes a private class representing each cart line and an an array representing everything in the cart.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    protected class 
    Cart.CartLine
    CartLine class is private to Cart and represents a single line item added to a cart.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private List<Cart.CartLine>
    cartLines
    An Array of all line items which have been added to the cart.
    protected int
    nextLine
    Serial number for CartLine lineNo.
    protected float
    subTotal
    The sum total of the extended price from all CartLines Currently synonymous with grand total, but future versions may add tax, shipping, etc.

  • Field Details

    • cartLines

      private List<Cart.CartLine> cartLines
      An Array of all line items which have been added to the cart.

    • nextLine

      protected int nextLine
      Serial number for CartLine lineNo. Unique to ea Cart.

    • subTotal

      protected float subTotal
      The sum total of the extended price from all CartLines Currently synonymous with grand total, but future versions may add tax, shipping, etc.

  • Constructor Details

    • Cart

      public Cart()
      Default Constructor

  • Method Details

    • exists

      private boolean exists(int lineNo)
      Checks if the specified line number exists among the Cart's lines.
      Parameters:
      lineNo - the requested CartLine number.
      Returns:
      true if found, else false.

    • addLine

      public void addLine(int itemNo, int qty)
      Adds a CartLine to the Cart. Prints an error to stdout if qty less than or equal to 0 or if itemNo does not exist among Product catalog.
      Parameters:
      itemNo - the item which should be added to the Cart.
      qty - the qty of item which should be added.

    • delLine

      public void delLine(int lineNo)
      Removes a CartLine item from the Cart as specified by lineNo. Prints an error to stdout if lineNo does not exist in Cart. NOTE: Remaining Cart lineNo's are not updated after deletion. As such, a Cart's lineNo's may not be sequential.
      Parameters:
      lineNo - The line which is requested to be removed.

    • printCart

      public void printCart()
      Prints all Cart line items. Starts by printing a header. Then loops through all CartLine's printing each as a row. Then prints the subtotal.

    • updateTotal

      private void updateTotal()
      Calculates the cart subtotal by iterating over all CartLines
